markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Oracle Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1853) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 152 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Oracle](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=42)

**Prerequisites**
[Oracle Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1851)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). When you gain a spell slot of a new level from the oracle archetype, add a common divine spell or another divine spell you have learned or discovered to your repertoire, of that spell level.

<title level="2">Basic Oracle Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Oracle Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1857), [Mysterious Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=1856)
name: Basic Oracle Spellcasting
